item.description:
Come experience the sacred energy of Oneness Blessing, also known as Deeksha. The Oneness Blessing assists us in awakening to our Divine nature, our internal source. It is shared at sacred gatherings where the Blessing Givers place hands lightly on each person's head (crown chakra) during a group meditation. This initiates a shift in our consciousness.
We experience greater connection as Divine Beings, one with all creation. These changes are cumulative - the more Blessings we receive, we become less reactive to old patterns and more reesponsive from the heart of love.
The Blessing does not belong to any religion, philosophy or belief system.
The Oneness Blessing events take place the second Sunday of each month at A Higher Balance, for donations only. Walk ins invited; join us at 6:30 be in the prayer circle. Each Blessing Giver is trained and certified to give Oneness Blessings. Learn more at www.OnenessUniversity.org.
item.name: Oneness Blessing Event
